description: A unique identifier for the department
An indicator variable for the manager's participation in the managment training program
The standardized engagement score for the manager's employees
The total number of years the manager has been with the company (both as manager and non-managerial employee)
The manager's job category inside the company
The average engagement score for that manager in the previous iteration of the engagement survey
The average engagement score in that same department
The number of employees in the manager's department
